Package stocker.model

Class WatchlistItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • stocker.model.WatchItem
      • stocker.model.WatchlistItem
  • public class WatchlistItem
extends WatchItem
    Represents an item (a stock, for instance) which is meant to be monitored in a watchlist. WatchlistItems are mainly used for transfer of the relevant data between the data manager and the watchlist.
    Author:
    Marc S. Schneider

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      WatchlistItem​(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a new WatchlistItem referring to the data with the provided key.

      • WatchlistItem

        public WatchlistItem​(java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.String name)
        Constructs a new WatchlistItem referring to the data with the provided key.
        Parameters:
        key - the ticker symbol of the item to be watched
        name - the descriptive name of the item to be watched

    • Method Detail

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice()
        Get the current (last reported) price for the represented item.
        Returns:
        the last available price

      • getTime

        public long getTime()
        Get the last time stamp for which a price is available.
        Returns:
        the unix timestamp for the latest available price

      • getQuoteTime

        public long getQuoteTime()
        Get the last time stamp at which a quote has been pulled
        Returns:
        the unix timestamp at which the last quote has been pulled

      • getCloseYesterday

        public double getCloseYesterday()
        Get yesterday's close value.
        Returns:
        yesterday's close value

      • setData

        public void setData​(long time,
                    double price,
                    double closeYesterday)
        Set the attributes of this WatchlistItem to the given values
        Parameters:
        time - the unix timestamp which the following values refer to
        price - the price at the time
        closeYesterday - the closing price at the previous day (required for calculation of daily change)

      • setQuote

        public void setQuote​(long time,
                     double price,
                     double closeYesterday)
        Sets the data of this WatchlistItem just like setData(long, double, double), but in addition sets the time for the last quote which can later be queried using getQuoteTime().
        Parameters:
        time - the unix timestamp which the following values refer to
        price - the price at the time
        closeYesterday - the closing price at the previous day (required for calculation of daily change)

        Serialize the content of this WatchItem into a JsonObject

        Returns:
